BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY 050200Z TO 120159Z JAN BY
   M/V NPS SANCO STAR AND M/V NPS OCEAN EUROPE
   TOWING THREE 200 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-23.32S 040-00.85W, 22-26.98S 039-54.68W,
   22-29.43S 039-56.05W, 22-25.72S 040-02.37W..
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 120259Z JAN 13.
